description.value:
You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable. Make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike}. This counts as three attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you get a critical hit. If you roll a critical hit, your attack also gains the deadly d12 trait.

Whether or not you hit, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned} 1 and are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.
